name: Poison and the entropy of interaction
description:
The poison on contact. You get the joy when touching things and people. That excitement dies by time, the entropy, which is something you cannot prevent. The more you interact, the less you live. Like the poison of the self. We touch to the end.
Generally I do not like to tell the things in my drawings, but this time, I will tell people who bought the pieces. So I will let the excitement die in honor of the drawing.
"Drawn by hand, colored on digital".
